props.content: A comprehensive reference of every Hookie CMS component, demonstrating all available props, variants, sizes, and style options.
All six heading levels with different colors, alignments, and weights.
All four text sizes with different font weights, colors, and alignments.
Text size sm, weight normal - Small text for captions, footnotes, and secondary information that does not need prominent visibility.
Text size base, weight semibold - Standard body text used for paragraphs, descriptions, and general content. This is the default size.
Text size lg, weight bold - Larger text for lead paragraphs, introductions, and emphasized content blocks.
Text size xl, weight normal - Extra large text for hero subtitles, featured quotes, and prominent callouts.
All five button variants (primary, secondary, danger, ghost, success) in all three sizes (sm, md, lg).
All four link variants (default, underline, button, pill) in all four colors (primary, success, danger, muted).
Demonstrating borderRadius, shadow, and hover effect options on the Image component.

props.text: Border Radius: xs, sm, md, lg, xl, full
Shadow: none, sm, md, lg, xl
Hover Effects: lift, zoom, glow, none

props.content: Card component with various shadow sizes, accent colors, and optional images.

props.title: Small Shadow
props.description: Card with an image and small shadow. Subtle elevation for minimal depth.

props.title: Medium Shadow
props.description: Card with an image and medium shadow. Default elevation for standard cards.

props.title: Large Shadow
props.description: Card with an image and large shadow. Strong elevation for prominent cards.

props.title: Blue Accent
props.description: Card with blue accent border and no image. Used for informational content.

props.title: Green Accent
props.description: Card with green accent border and no image. Used for success states.

props.title: Red Accent
props.description: Card with red accent border and no image. Used for warnings or errors.

props.title: Purple Accent
props.description: Card with purple accent border and no image. Used for creative content.

props.content: All four alert types: info, warning, error, and success. Each with a title and descriptive message.

props.title: Information
props.message: This is an informational alert. Use it to provide neutral tips, guidance, or context to the user.

props.title: Warning
props.message: This is a warning alert. Use it to caution users about potential issues or actions that need attention.

props.title: Error
props.message: This is an error alert. Use it to communicate failures, validation errors, or critical problems.

props.title: Success
props.message: This is a success alert. Use it to confirm completed actions, saved data, or positive outcomes.

props.content: Unordered lists with all bullet styles and ordered lists with all number styles.
All divider variants, thicknesses, named colors, and gradient options.
Grid column layouts and Section background options.
